name: The Miami SEO
description:
Founded and created by a group of young, motivated individuals who took a stand to create a truly professional marketing company. A few years back, while working as project managers for several SEO companies, the creators of The Miami SEO Company realized that most SEO companies in South Florida were not stepping up to the plate and adapting to the changes that search engine algorithm updates entailed. Shortly after,  they decided to take  stand and develop a truly professional company.
The concept was simple, provide SEO services that work, for the long run. Today, we have over 100 clients which all experience a boost in organic placement and traffic each time there is an algorithm update. Our team and our clients couldn't be happier. The Miami SEO Company offers a variety of professional marketing services from local to gobal eCommerce SEO and SEM management. Our specialty is in PPC management for large corporations as well as Organic optimization for eCommerce websites. Our data driven marketing solutions provide ROI tracking and lead tracking so that you can see what your returns are on your marketing investment. Don't settle for a company that only provides you with link building and rank reports, choose the pros. Our team is comprised of experience search marketing gurus, not underpaid entry level employees with absolutely no value to add to the services you are paying for. All of our employees are Adwords & Analytics certified.
